attributes.action: Catherine calderwood to be removed from post as Scottish chief medical officer
attributes.additional_details: We want the government to step in to make the change in personnel as the Scottish government have not done so and a appology will not be suffice in the current situation
attributes.background: We would like the government to take control of the situation in Scotland as SNP will not ask Catherine to step down from her role we as a country have been lied to and took advice and stayed home while Catherine has been enjoying flaunting the rules to go on weekend breaks to holiday home
